mapper.insert: insert into info(info_id, info_name, info_nickname, info_pass, info_hp, info_email, info_birth, info_gaipday) values(#{id},#{name},#{nickname},#{pass},#{hp},#{email},#{birth},now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from info where info_id=#{id} and info_pass=#{pass}
select count(*) from info where info_id=#{id}
select count(*) from info where info_nickname=#{nickname}
select info_nickname from info where info_id=#{id}
select * from info order by info_id
